edu.iu.dsc.tws.comms.shuffle

Class FSKeyedSortedMerger2

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.iu.dsc.tws.comms.shuffle.FSKeyedSortedMerger2
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Shuffle

    public class FSKeyedSortedMerger2
extends java.lang.Object
implements Shuffle
    Sorted merger implementation todo add support to handling large values. When tuples have large values, since we are opening multiple files at the same time, when reading, this implementation overloads heap
